points.name: Neiguan
points.location_hint: Inner forearm, ~3 finger-breadths above wrist crease, between tendons
points.notes: Common anti-nausea/acupressure point; often used with wrist bands.

points.name: Zusanli
points.location_hint: Below knee, one finger breadth lateral to tibia crest
points.notes: Digestive support and qi boosting.

points.name: Gongsun
points.location_hint: Medial foot, distal to base of 1st metatarsal
points.notes: Often paired with PC6 for stomach/epigastric issues.

points.name: Hegu
points.location_hint: Hand web between thumb and index finger
points.notes: General pain/regulation point; avoid in pregnancy.

points.name: Taichong
points.location_hint: Dorsum of foot between 1st and 2nd metatarsals
points.notes: Moves Liver qi; used for nausea with stress component.

points.name: Hall of Impression (Yintang)
points.location_hint: Between eyebrows at glabella
points.notes: Calms mind; also used for sinus pressure/headache.

points.name: Heavenly Gate (Ear Shenmen)
points.location_hint: Triangular fossa of the ear
points.notes: Soothing point in auricular therapy.

points.name: Shoulder Well
points.location_hint: Highest point of shoulder muscle midpoint
points.notes: Releases shoulder/neck tension; avoid in pregnancy.

points.name: Union Valley
points.location_hint: Hand web between thumb and index finger
points.notes: General pain/stress modulator; avoid in pregnancy.

points.name: Great Surge
points.location_hint: Dorsum of foot between 1st and 2nd metatarsals
points.notes: Liver qi regulating; used for mood and tension.

points.name: Spirit Gate
points.location_hint: Ulnar side of wrist crease in small depression
points.notes: Calms shen; classic for sleep and anxiety.

points.name: Three Yin Intersection
points.location_hint: Medial lower leg, ~3 cun above medial malleolus
points.notes: Crossing point of SP/KI/LV; nourishes yin; avoid in pregnancy.

points.name: Bubbling Spring
points.location_hint: Sole, depression just below ball of foot
points.notes: Grounding point; used to descend excess yang.

points.name: Inner Frontier Gate
points.location_hint: Inner forearm, ~3 finger-breadths above wrist crease
points.notes: Settles chest; useful for palpitations/anxiety-related insomnia.

points.name: Wind Pool
points.location_hint: Base of skull, in hollows lateral to tendons
points.notes: Releases wind; sometimes used to relax neck and aid sleep.

points.name: Union Valley
points.location_hint: Hand web between thumb and index finger
points.notes: Common for frontal/temporal headaches; avoid in pregnancy.

points.name: Gates of Consciousness
points.location_hint: Base of skull, hollows beside large tendons

points.name: Third Eye (Yintang)

points.notes: Sinus/frontal headaches and calming.

points.name: Temple (Taiyang)

points.notes: Temporal headaches.

points.name: Drilling Bamboo
points.location_hint: Inner end of eyebrows
points.notes: Frontal/sinus headaches.

points.name: Shoulder Well
points.location_hint: Highest point of shoulder muscle midpoint
points.notes: Releases upper trapezius tension; avoid in pregnancy.

points.name: Gates of Consciousness
points.location_hint: Base of skull, hollows beside tendons
points.notes: Neck stiffness and occipital pain.

points.name: Small Intestine 3
points.location_hint: Ulnar side of hand, proximal to little finger MCP joint
points.notes: Neck/upper back channel opener (paired with BL62).

points.name: Waiguan
points.location_hint: Dorsal forearm, ~2 cun above wrist crease between radius/ulna
points.notes: Releases exterior, relieves lateral neck pain.

points.name: Union Valley
points.location_hint: Hand web between thumb and index finger
points.notes: Adjunct for neck/shoulder tension; avoid in pregnancy.

points.name: Kidney Shu
points.location_hint: 1.5 cun lateral to L2 spinous process
points.notes: Tonifies Kidneys; chronic low back soreness.

points.name: Weizhong
points.location_hint: Midpoint of popliteal crease
points.notes: Key distal point for back pain/sciatica.

points.name: Huantiao
points.location_hint: Posterolateral hip, junction of outer third and inner two-thirds between greater trochanter and sacrum

points.name: Kunlun

points.name: Taixi
